title: Nightfall
description: In this Dateline classic, investigators scramble to find a killer after a young mother is found dead 40 miles from Knoxville, Tennessee on the side of a country road. Andrea Canning reports. Originally aired on NBC on April 14, 2017.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
